name: Aeropuerto Internacional Capitán FAP José Abelardo Quiñones Gonzáles
nameEnglish: Capitán FAP José Abelardo Quiñones Gonzáles International Airport
description: José Abelardo Quiñones Gonzáles International gets its three-letter code from its home in the city of *C*h*i*clayo. The code is completed by an ‘*X*’, often used as a filler letter.
